Posts.Content: Jun 9, 2013 05:04PM cowgill wrote: I have completed 3 of 4 chemo treatments and my eyes are watering like crazy.  It drives me crazy, but the worst part is it seems to be affecting my contacts.  Does anyone else have a problem with this.  It seems to put a kind of film on them that then causes my vison to be very cloudy.  Thank you
Posts.Title: Eye watering from Taxotere trishK_ cowgill
